subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
lead_paragraph: Farr was an N.F.L. rookie of the year in 1967, when he rushed for 860 yards in 13 games, and then played six more seasons, all with Detroit.
snippet: Farr was an N.F.L. rookie of the year in 1967, when he rushed for 860 yards in 13 games, and then played six more seasons, all with Detroit.
